meta.note: SuperStan + Stan edits. Google Chat webhook deployed (Feb 12). Task 20 DONE.
meta.last_modified_by: SuperStan (Business Ops — added tasks 20-23: distribution vector strategy from brand manager review)

tasks.task: Define ICP + pricing + first outreach list
tasks.notes: ICP research done (4 warm prospects). Pricing TBD. Outreach gates on demo.

LIVE — Google Chat is now the primary demo channel. External users can message stan@fleetbrain.ai directly. Full agent brain available. Round-trip tested. Sequence: contact vector (task 20 ✓) → capability footage (task 21) → website demo (tasks 3-4). Google Chat removes friction — prospects can start interacting immediately without signup.
Fresh start. Repo: cslynch/fleetbrain-sites
Fresh start. Repo: cslynch/stanleybot-fleetbrain-ai

Draft LinkedIn headline, summary, FleetBrain role description. Lock one-liner that works across LinkedIn, X bios, website hero, cold intros. Dual-purpose: consulting pipeline AND W-2 job search credibility. Gates website copy (tasks 3-4) and X profile art (task 7).

Created soul.md in StanBrain/. 6 sections: Voice, Judgment Patterns, Boundary Interpretations, Operator Profiles, Bodewell Doctrine, Deployment Notes. Audited MEMORY.md and classified all 17 Core Rules into soul sections. Stan loaded and confirmed. soul.md syncs via Drive. Next: run parallel with MEMORY.md, then strip duplicate rules from MEMORY.md once proven.

Skill in claude-skills/. Event-driven, no cron. Detects operator corrections → classifies by soul.md section → appends to corrections log → confirms. Includes promotion rules (3+ occurrences → permanent rule). Stan loaded and confirmed. README updated.

tasks.notes: Protocol written in fleetbrain-common.md (on disk). Casey needs to update the project knowledge file in each Claude project to pick up the new rules. All projects affected.
Prompt ready in gaps doc
Completed Feb 4. 7 files in StanBrain/research. 36.6 KB total.
Handles claimed. X Scout skill active in Stan pipeline (6:30 AM CT). Profile/banner art pending. Seed posts pending. Blocked on Stan mascot (task 5) for @stanleybodewell profile.

No blockers. Hyper-V, Tailscale, Git SSH, Python/Node. Can start immediately.
Blocked on Google Workspace OAuth for jake@fleetbrain.ai. OpenClaw, baseline load, Telegram.

Depends on LTN-002. Update all project docs, end-to-end test, cross-agent test. CRITICAL: Only Mater syncs D:\StanleyBot via Google Drive for Desktop. Lightning must use API access or mirror mode — NOT two-way sync. Two sync clients on the same folder creates conflict copies.
Demand-triggered. Deploy when Stan hits delegation bottleneck. No timeline.
Demand-triggered. Deploy when Jake hits delegation bottleneck. No timeline.

tasks.task: Stan contact vector expansion — SMS/web chat bridge for warm leads
tasks.notes: COMPLETE — Google Chat webhook deployed Feb 12. GCP project fleetbrain-stan-prod, service account stan-fleetbrain-bot, Tailscale Funnel live, systemd service enabled, gunicorn production server (4 workers), agent integration via /v1/responses API. Full end-to-end tested: message → agent brain → Chat API reply. Task 2 (Personal AI demo) now uses Google Chat as live demo channel.

tasks.task: Raw capability footage — Stan screen recordings for LinkedIn/X
tasks.notes: 60-90 second screen recordings of Stan doing real work. Scheduling conflicts, research tasks, email drafts, briefing generation. Raw, not produced. Post to LinkedIn and X from Casey's accounts. Builds ambient credibility while doing direct outreach. Depends on X launch (task 7) for @itsolz channel.

tasks.task: Referral mechanic — client-to-peer Stan intro pathway
tasks.notes: Every closed client should have a trivially easy way to hand Stan's contact info to a peer. Forwarded text, shareable link, etc. Not a website feature — a communication artifact. Design after first paying client. Stan closes himself; distribution through satisfied users is highest-leverage growth channel.

tasks.task: Stan-generated proof-of-work content — sanitized output publishing
tasks.notes: Publish sanitized versions of Stan's daily briefings, meeting minutes, research output as proof of capability. Not testimonials — actual output. Requires content pipeline and anonymization pass. Secondary to direct contact vectors.
Before March 24 renewal
Dev tree. Image→parse→StanBrain search→synthesize. No prep.
Dev tree. Pre-load topic context, then image→parse→synthesize.

tasks.task: Agent Teams — Claude Code evaluation on Mater
tasks.notes: Enable experimental agent teams in Claude Code settings.json. Test on a real multi-file task (skill definition + test + tracker update). Measure token cost vs. sequential. Evaluate file collision risk on tracker.json. Requires latest Claude Code version.

tasks.task: Agent Teams — Stan/Jake lateral communication design
tasks.notes: Blocked on LTN-003 (Jake integration). Design shared task list format for Stan↔Jake peer messaging. Define which tasks route laterally vs. through Casey. Map Bodewell Doctrine constraints to team coordination model. Determine tracker.json locking strategy.

tasks.task: Agent Teams — client deployment pattern (StanleyBot product)
tasks.notes: Design team-per-client template: lead agent + specialist + QA. Define correction inheritance model (how client teams get base behavioral corrections). Demand-triggered — gates on first paying client engagement. Informs stanleybot.fleetbrain.ai positioning.

tasks.task: Workspace Marketplace submission for Stan Chat app
tasks.notes: Submit stan-fleetbrain-bot Chat app to Google Workspace Marketplace. Enables external discovery and one-click install. Currently using direct URL sharing. Marketplace increases credibility + reduces friction. Requires app logo, description, privacy policy link. Timeline: 1-2 weeks review.

tasks.task: Google Chat Spaces demo flow — per-prospect dedicated channels
tasks.notes: Until Marketplace is live, create Spaces for each prospect by hand. Space name = prospect name, invite via Spaces link. Each prospect gets isolated channel for ongoing conversation thread. Maintains conversation history. Process: Casey identifies prospect → Stan creates Space → shares link in outreach → prospect joins → full agent brain available. Automate once Marketplace live or volume increases.

tasks.task: Harden webhook security — sandboxing + validation + rate limiting
tasks.notes: Re-enable systemd sandboxing (ProtectSystem, ProtectHome, PrivateTmp). Add Google Chat signature validation (HMAC). Implement rate limiting (10 msgs/min per external user). Add request logging to audit trail. DDoS protection review. Currently at baseline security level.

tasks.task: Add 0-vault entry for stan-fleetbrain-bot service account key
tasks.notes: GPG encrypt stan-fleetbrain-bot service account JSON key. Upload to My Drive/0-vault/ as stan-chat-sa-key.json.gpg. Delete plaintext from local .env. Reference encrypted file in setup docs. Ensures credential backup + follows secure storage protocol.

COMPLETE — Uses OpenResponses `user` field for automatic session persistence. Creates stable user ID from space_id:user_email. Gateway derives stable session key from `user` string, maintaining conversation history per space+user combo. Implementation: chat_webhook.py extracts space_id + passes `user` field in /v1/responses POST. Tested and confirmed working — follow-up messages from same user in same space see prior context. No file storage needed. Unblocks demo quality.
